Advanced Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism

COURSE DURATION: 

  • 1 Year

 

ADMISSION REQUIREMENTS:

  • You must have completed the CTH Diploma in Hospitality and Tourism Management, or have been granted an exemption from this.

 

COURSE STRUCTURE:

  • Six  Modules must be completed
  • You’ll write a 3 hour exam each for FIVE or the modules, which will also require assignments.
  • For the 6th Module, you will be assessed on your 5 000 word Management Research Report.

 

COURSE CONTENT:

  • Module One: Strategic Management for Hospitality & Tourism
  • Module Two: Management Accounting
  • Module Three: Human Resource Management
  • Module Four: Management Research Report
  • Module Five: Tourism Operations
  • Module Six: Sustainable Tourism & Destination Management

 

CAREER PATH:

Apply for a Senior Management job in the industry as a:

  • Business Travel Agent
  • Food and Beverage Assistant Manager
  • Front-of-House Assistant Manager
  • Junior Banqueting Manager
  • Restaurant Manager
  • Travel Guide Manager
  • Night Manager
  • Kitchen Manager

 

PROGRESS OPPORTUNITIES:

Progress to our Pro-Graduate Diploma or gain access to the final  year of one of the following Universities for a degree:

 

 

OTHER MANAGEMENT PROGRAMMES IN HOSPITALITY AND TOURISM.

  • Certificate in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Advanced Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Pro-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Post-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
